wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.name: primaryText
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.description: Required. Primary text which describes the status/severity of the transport mode disruption.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.name: contentText
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.description: Further text to describe the route of the mode of transport.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.name: mode
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.description: Required. Specifies the travel mode which the disruption relates to. Accepted values are: bus, coach, cycle, metro, plane, rail, roads and walk.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.name: iconRight
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.description: The icon tag which specifies the icon to show to the right of the indicator (see icon reference). By default, no icon will be displayed.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.name: iconLeft
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.description: The icon tag which specifies the icon to show to the left of the indicator (see icon reference). By default, no icon will be displayed.

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.name: classes
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorLargeProps.description: List of additional classes which will be added to the disruption indicator. A typical use case is modifying the badge colour to indicate severity e.g. wmnds-disruption-indicator-small--severe
